title: ms problem
body:
hi there,

i used to play in EUW server but in this summer i moved to north america to LA and i started playing in NA server in the first three weeks my MS was 70-80 that was good for me but lately it started to rise to 300 and stay up there for the rest of the game, it keeps going up and down the whole game , i can see the creeps doing their AA animation but i can't see the AA in the air or hitting anybody, I check my FPS and it's 60 and constant no drops in that.

any ideas?

replies.body:
cool, will try that out
thanks

The game requires a constant connection to our game server, otherwise you may experience issues like input delay.   The issue you are experiencing may be due to an unstable connection with your network or the route your ISP is taking to reach the game server.  If Rineyy's link to our Connection Troubleshooting guide doesn't resolve your issue, please[ submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to our tech team and attach a [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2).  They will be able to review this and help you out further!
